\documentclass[border=6pt]{standalone}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}

\usepackage{qcircuit}

\begin{document}

\Qcircuit @C=1em @R=.7em {
& \gate{H} & \ctrlo{1} & \gate{H} & \qw \\
& \gate{H}  & \ctrlo{1}  & \gate{H} & \qw \\
& \gate{Z} & \targ & \gate{Z} & \qw & \qw \\
}

\end{document}
